questions.question: What is a digital signature in the context of cryptocurrencies?
choices: A cryptographic proof of authenticity and integrity
A physical signature on a paper wallet
A digital image of a handwritten signature
A password used to access a cryptocurrency wallet
questions.answer: A cryptographic proof of authenticity and integrity

questions.question: What is the purpose of a cryptocurrency wallet?
choices: To store, send, and receive cryptocurrencies
To convert cryptocurrencies to fiat money
questions.answer: To store, send, and receive cryptocurrencies
